```{r}
library(tidyverse) 

yearly <- read.csv("deaths_handwashing.csv")

yearly
```

```{r}
yearly_aux1 <- mutate(yearly, proportion_death = deaths/births)
yearly_aux2 <- mutate(yearly, proportion_death = deaths/births)

yearly_aux1 
```


```{r}
yearly_aux1 %>%
  
  filter(clinic == "clinic 1")

ggplot(yearly_aux1, aes(x=year, y=proportion_death))+ geom_line()
  
```

```{r}
yearly_aux2 %>%
filter(clinic == "clinic 2")


ggplot(yearly_aux2, aes(x=year, y=proportion_death))+ geom_line()




```
